title: Dooby Dooby Moo
description: Sure, they can type, but did you know that Farmer Brown’s animals can sing ? The bestselling duo, Doreen Cronin and Betsy Lewin—who brought you Click, Clack, Cows That Type; Giggle, Giggle, Quack; and Duck for President —cordially invite you to the county fair, where the talent is truly wild.Duck and his friends are at it again. But this time they’re pooling their considerable resources to win a local talent show, because first prize is a trampoline!The cows want to sing.The sheep want to sing.The pigs want to...dance. Dance?And Duck? Duck just wants to win that trampoline. But first he’ll have to handle Farmer Brown.
author: Doreen Cronin
